channel.title: How do I add a shop? Like people can trade this shop, but no one can buy anyythi
channel.description: Like people can trade this shop, but no one can buy anyythigg. And HOW do I make it so they can open the shop of said npc

item.title: How do I add a shop? Like people can trade this shop, but no one can buy anyythi
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Can you give us some more information?
Also, putting your topic title the same as the thread itself is an eyesore.
We need to know your revision, and your base at least.
Providing the code for said shop is also helpful.

Read full topic
